attributes.action: allow MPs to go around parliament saying vumtar vumtar and bud bud badooo!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is intended to free MPs from their daily routines and allow them to have more fun at work. This would help to combat voter apathy and bring public confidence back into the political process

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
